title: Tempur-Pedic® Presents: Still As Can Be
description:
You’ve heard Tempur-Pedic is better. But do you know why? …If you’re familiar with the iconic wine glass test, you know that it’s proof that Tempur-Pedic is in a class of its own in reducing motion transfer. It means you sleep still and undisturbed through the night. So we set out to prove it once again…with dancers, yoga, backflips, sledgehammers and kids who just had a lot of sugar. As always, the wine glass remains still as can be. Ordinary memory foam and spring mattresses just don’t compare. 

There’s simply nothing like a Tempur-Pedic — reduced motion transfer for undisturbed, life-changing sleep.
